page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT
page.content: THE MAJORITY OF THE PEOPLE IN OUR AREA ACTUALLY WORK IN OUR AREA.SOME OF THOSE PEOPLE WORK IN THE FIRMS AT THE {DEANS INDUSTRIAL ESTATE}LIKE THE { {N.E.C.}OR AT SWIFT ADHESIVES ETC ABOUT65%OF THE PEOPLE WHO WORK AT THE N.E.C.LIVE IN {LIVINGSTON}.MOST OF THE PEOPLE THAT ARE LEFT WORK AT THE LOCAL HOSPITAL.OTHERS WORK IN THE SCHOOLS NEARBY.THE LARGEST PROPORTION OF PEOPLE WORK IN EDINBURGH.THE THIRD LARGEST PROPORTION OF PEOPLE WORK IN ANOTHER LOCAL TOWN CALLED BATHGATE.BROXBURN HAS THE FOURTH LARGEST PROPORTION OF WORKERS FROM LIVINGSTON WORKING THERE. THERE ARE ALSO A FEW FARMS IN OUR AREA AND PEOPLE WORK ON THE FARMS AS FARM LABOURERS AND AS FARMERS. UNEMPLOYMENT IS NOT TOO HIGH IN OUR AREA.
